meanings.definition: A digital audio or video file or recording, usually part of a themed series, that can be downloaded or streamed online.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to podcasts on my phone during long car rides.
meanings.sent2: She subscribed to several podcasts about history and science.
meanings.sent3: The podcasts about animals always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library of podcasts, each episode a different adventure.
meanings.sent5: The podcasts filled the room with stories and laughter.

meanings.definition: To create or participate in the production of podcasts.
meanings.sent1: He podcasts about sports every week with his friends.
meanings.sent2: They decided to start podcasting about their favorite books.
meanings.sent3: She joked that she could podcast in her sleep.
meanings.sent4: Their voices podcasted across the internet, reaching listeners worldwide.
meanings.sent5: Podcasting requires creativity and dedication to produce engaging content.
